targets.queryText:
WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT txgroup_id, name AS top_category, parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
      ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    SUM(t.value_usd) AS total_revenue
FROM general_ledger t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE gh.top_category = 'Revenue'
  AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000

    SUM(t.value_usd) AS total_revenue
FROM general_ledger t

  AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000

targets.queryText:
WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
      ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    (
        -- Revenue
        SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Revenue'         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Cost of Revenue
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Expenses'        THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Income
      + SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Income'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Expenses'  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS total_net
FROM general_ledger t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
      ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    (
        -- Revenue
        SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Revenue'         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Cost of Revenue
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Expenses'        THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Income
      + SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Income'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Expenses'  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS total_net
FROM general_ledger t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000

targets.queryText:
WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
        ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    t.timestamp,
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income')         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Total Revenue",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) * -1 AS "Total Expenses",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income') THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Net"
FROM general_ledger AS t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh
    ON t.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp;

)
SELECT
    t.timestamp,
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income')         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Total Revenue",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) * -1 AS "Total Expenses",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income') THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Net"
FROM general_ledger AS t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh
    ON t.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp;

WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
      ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    (
        -- Revenue
        SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Revenue'         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Cost of Revenue
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Expenses'        THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Income
      + SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Income'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Expenses'  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Sort Me (Inbound)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Sort Me (Inbound)'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Sort Me (Outbound)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Sort Me (Outbound)'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS total_net
FROM general_ledger t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000

    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
      ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id

SELECT
    (
        -- Revenue

        -- Cost of Revenue
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Expenses
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Expenses'        THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Income
      + SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Other Income'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Other Expenses

        -- Sort Me (Inbound)
      + SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Sort Me (Inbound)'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
        -- Sort Me (Outbound)
      - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category = 'Sort Me (Outbound)'    THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS total_net
FROM general_ledger t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000

targets.queryText:
WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
        ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    t.timestamp,
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income','Sort Me (Inbound)')         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Total Revenue (incl. Unsorted)",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses','Sort Me (Outbound)')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) * -1 AS "Total Expenses (incl. Unsorted)",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income','Sort Me (Inbound)') THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses','Sort Me (Outbound)')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Net (incl. Unsorted)"
FROM general_ledger AS t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh
    ON t.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp;
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH RECURSIVE group_hierarchy (txgroup_id, top_category, parent_txgroup) AS (
    SELECT
        txgroup_id,
        name AS top_category,
        parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups
    WHERE parent_txgroup IS NULL

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        child.txgroup_id,
        parent.top_category,
        child.parent_txgroup
    FROM txgroups AS child
    JOIN group_hierarchy AS parent
        ON child.parent_txgroup = parent.txgroup_id
)
SELECT
    t.timestamp,
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income','Sort Me (Inbound)')         THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Total Revenue (incl. Unsorted)",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses','Sort Me (Outbound)')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) * -1 AS "Total Expenses (incl. Unsorted)",
    SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Revenue', 'Other Income','Sort Me (Inbound)') THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue','Expenses','Other Expenses','Sort Me (Outbound)')  THEN t.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Net (incl. Unsorted)"
FROM general_ledger AS t
JOIN group_hierarchy gh
    ON t.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id
WHERE t.timestamp >= $__from/1000
  AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp;
